movies.title: Camping sauvage
movies.plot: Pierre-Louis is a successful investment broker who sees a hit and run and informs the police. As he is the only eyewitness willing to testify against the driver Jackhammer, the vicious leader of a gang of bikers, Pierre-Louis is whisked off to the witness protection program in a trailer park run by the kitschy Jackie Pigeon. A chapter of inept bikers called the Wanna-Bees also come to stay at the campground. When Pierre-Louis and Jackie are attracted to each other, Pierre-Louis is threatened by the investigating police officer, who also has designs on Jackie. Meanwhile Jackhammer is out on bail and contacts all the biker chapters to be on the lookout for the disguised Pierre-Louis.

biography.bio: Guy A. Lepage was born on August 30, 1960 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. He is a writer and actor, known for Un gars, une fille (1997), Un gars, une fille (1999) and S' agapo - M' agapas (2000). He was previously married to Louise Richer.
biography.name: Guy A. Lepage

biography.bio: Sylvie Moreau was born on December 30, 1964. She is an actress and writer, known for Catherine (1999), Familia (2005) and Dans une galaxie près de chez vous (1999). She was previously married to 'François Papineau.
biography.name: Sylvie Moreau

biography.bio: Normand D'Amour was born on September 22, 1962. He is an actor, known for 5150 rue des Ormes (2009), Le Garagiste (2015) and Camping sauvage (2004).
biography.name: Normand D'Amour

biography.bio: Benoît Girard was born on January 26, 1932. He was an actor, known for The Rocket (2005), Félix et Meira (2014) and Camping sauvage (2004). He was married to Monique Joly. He died on March 26, 2017 in Montréal, Québec, Canada.
biography.name: Benoît Girard

biography.bio: Réal Bossé was born on August 9, 1962 in Québec, Canada. He is an actor and writer, known for 19-2 (2011), Seducing Doctor Lewis (2003) and The Bottle (2000).
biography.name: Réal Bossé

biography.bio: Stéphane F. Jacques is an actor, known for Camping sauvage (2004), February 15, 1839 (2001) and Shall We Dance (2004).
biography.name: Stéphane F. Jacques

biography.bio: Yves Pelletier was born on January 15, 1961 in Laval, Québec, Canada. He is an actor and writer, known for Karmina (1996), Karmina 2 (2001) and Rock et Belles Oreilles: The DVD 1994-95 (2001).
biography.name: Yves Pelletier

biography.bio: Emmanuel Bilodeau was born on August 29, 1964 in Hull, Québec, Canada. He is an actor, known for The Revenant (2015), Curling (2010) and Taking Lives (2004).
biography.name: Emmanuel Bilodeau

biography.bio: Louis Champagne was born in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. He is an actor, known for Monsieur Lazhar (2011), Minuit, le soir (2005) and Amsterdam (2013).
biography.name: Louis Champagne

biography.bio: Sylvain Larocque is an actor and writer, known for Camping sauvage (2004), Mablonde.tv (2009) and Un gars, une fille (1997).
biography.name: Sylvain Larocque

biography.bio: André Ducharme was born on July 23, 1961 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. He is a writer and actor, known for Camping sauvage (2004), Rock et Belles Oreilles: The DVD 1986-87 (2001) and Rock et Belles Oreilles: The DVD 1988 (2001).
biography.name: André Ducharme

biography.bio: Denis Trudel was born on July 18, 1963. He is an actor, known for C.R.A.Z.Y. (2005), February 15, 1839 (2001) and La lâcheté (2007).
biography.name: Denis Trudel

biography.bio: Patric Saucier is an actor, known for Camping sauvage (2004), Chabotte et fille (2009) and Complexe G (2014).
biography.name: Patric Saucier

biography.bio: Stéphane Demers was born in 1966 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Aviator (2004), Trudeau II: Maverick in the Making (2005) and Monsieur Lazhar (2011).
biography.name: Stéphane Demers

biography.bio: Dominic Philie was born in Valleyfield, Québec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Starbuck (2011), Les Boys (1997) and Les Boys III (2001). He is married to Sylvie Brodeur. They have two children.
biography.name: Dominic Philie
